abstract: Patricia M Vroom, Arizona Immigration and Customs Enforcement agency lawyer, reaches settlement of almost $400k with Department of Homeland Security, after suing for discrimination.
lead_paragraph: The department reached a settlement with the top lawyer in the Immigration and Customs Enforcement agency in Arizona, who had claimed discrimination.

headline.main: Arizona: Lawyer Paid to End Suit Against Homeland Security
headline.print_headline: Arizona: Lawyer Is Paid to End Suit Against Homeland Security

snippet: The department reached a settlement with the top lawyer in the Immigration and Customs Enforcement agency in Arizona, who had claimed discrimination.
